DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate compare potential anti-caries efficacy test regimen : placebo ( fluoride free ) toothpaste ( twice daily use ) plus fluoride mouthwash ( daily use ) , comparison brush placebo toothpaste alone ( twice daily use ) , remineralize previously demineralize enamel specimen , measure Surface MicroHardness Recovery ( % SMHR ) . This single center , randomize , laboratory analyst blind , placebo , four treatment , cross-over study healthy participant . Participants assess baseline begin end treatment visit monitor clinical efficacy safety .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Oral Hygiene Products In Situ Caries Model
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 18 85 year inclusive 2 . Understands willing , able likely comply study procedure restriction 3 . Absence condition could affect participant 's safety wellbeing ability understand follow study procedures requirement 4 . Currently live Indianapolis , Indiana area professional fluoride treatment within 14 day first treatment visit 5 . Currently wear removable mandibular partial denture sufficient room one posterior buccal flange area accommodate two enamel specimen 6 . Willing denture modify accommodate enamel test specimen willing capable wear removable mandibular partial denture 24 hour per day experimental period 7 . Have salivary flow rate range normal value ( unstimulated whole saliva flow rate ≥ 0.2 milliliter ( mL ) /minute ; gum base stimulate whole saliva flow rate ≥ 0.8 mL/minute ) . 1 . Pregnant breast feed woman 2 . Known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity study material ( closely relate compound ) state ingredient 3 . Participation another GSKCH investigational dental product study within seven day first study treatment . 6 . Previous participation study . 7 .
